title: Cat people
creator_credit: Jacques Tourneur, Val Lewton and RKO Radio Pictures
brief_description: This classic horror tale stars Simone Simon as a young bride who is the victim of an ancient curse, that affects the female descendants of a Serbian village, transforming her into a panther to attack victims before reverting to human form. Also starring Kent Smith. Based on the story by DeWitt Bodeen.
